\documentclass[10pt,a4paper,titlepage]{report}

% These two lines are important!  They hide dates and auto-generated IDs from the PDF output, so that the PDF builds are reproducible.
% Without this we would commit the PDF to SVN on every build, regardless of whether the .md files were updated.
\special{pdf:trailerid [
	<00112233445566778899aabbccddeeff>
	<00112233445566778899aabbccddeeff>
	]}

% So that pandoc plays nice
\usepackage{booktabs}

% allows more symbols to be used within a block of text + eqns
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}

% The 3 lines below fixes "undefined environment \begin{Shade}" when using "```code" blocks in the markdown files.
	$if(highlighting-macros)$
	$highlighting-macros$
	$endif$

%%To fix the \tightlist error
\providecommand{\tightlist}{%
	\setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}}

%using custom fonts
\usepackage{fontspec}
\setmainfont[
BoldFont = {Helvetica Now Display Bold}
]{Helvetica Now Display}
\newfontfamily\headingfont[]{Helvetica Now Display Bold}

%force sans serif
%\renewcommand{\familydefault}{sfdefault}

%datetime
\usepackage{datetime}

%Ability to Underline
\usepackage[normalem]{ulem}

% Tweak word splitting and kerning
\usepackage{microtype}
\hyphenpenalty=2000

%references
\usepackage[hidelinks]{hyperref} % creates hypertext links in pdf files (natbib compatible)
\hypersetup{
	pdfinfo={ Title={EITRI DOCUMENTATION},
		DLP={TRUE}
	}
}   
\usepackage[capitalise]{cleveref}
\crefname{appsec}{Appendix}{Appendices}


%images, including max-width
\usepackage[export]{adjustbox}
\usepackage{letltxmacro}
\graphicspath{ {./tempimg/} }
\LetLtxMacro\originalincludegraphics\includegraphics
\renewcommand{\includegraphics}[2][max width=0.8\textwidth,max height=\textheight]{\originalincludegraphics[#1]{#2}}

\usepackage{float}
\let\origfigure\figure
\let\endorigfigure\endfigure
\renewenvironment{figure}[1][2] {
	\expandafter\origfigure\expandafter[H]
} {
	\endorigfigure
}

\renewcommand{\textfraction}{0.1}
\renewcommand{\topfraction}{0.90}
\renewcommand{\bottomfraction}{0.90}
%%\renewcommand{\floatpagefraction}{0.66}

%no page breaks in paragraphs
\widowpenalties 1 10000
\raggedbottom

%tables
\usepackage{widetable}
\usepackage{longtable}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{multirow} 
\usepackage{hyphenat}
\usepackage{pdflscape}
\newcommand{\blandscape}{\begin{landscape}} %allows you to use \blandscape in markdown
	\newcommand{\elandscape}{\end{landscape}}

%% Colour setup
\usepackage[dvipsnames, table]{xcolor}
\definecolor{tealHighlight}{RGB}{73, 160, 173}
\definecolor{red}{RGB}{227, 6, 19}
\definecolor{RED}{RGB}{227, 6, 19}
\definecolor{green}{RGB}{82, 174, 50}
\definecolor{GREEN}{RGB}{82, 174, 50}
\definecolor{yellow}{RGB}{255, 255, 0}
\definecolor{lightGrey}{RGB}{ 229, 229, 229}
\definecolor{white}{RGB}{255, 255, 255}

%geometry
\usepackage[%
a4paper,
includeheadfoot,
marginpar=2.5cm,
textheight=21cm,
left=2.5cm,
right=2.5cm,
headheight=2cm,
tmargin=1.5cm,
headsep=1cm
]{geometry}

\renewcommand{\footnoterule}{\hrule width \textwidth}
\setlength{\footnotesep}{1em}
\setlength{\skip\footins}{5em}
\usepackage[titletoc]{appendix}
\usepackage{titlesec}
\assignpagestyle{\chapter}{fancy}

\usepackage{chngcntr}
\setcounter{secnumdepth}{7}

\titleformat{name=\chapter}{\Huge\headingfont}{\makebox[25pt][l]{\thechapter. }}{1em}{}

\titleformat{name=\section}[block]{\Large\headingfont}{\makebox[48pt][l]{\thesection. }}{0em}{}
\titleformat{name=\section,numberless}{\Large\headingfont}{\makebox[48pt][l]{\hspace{48pt}}}{0em}{}

\titleformat{name=\subsection}[block]{\large\headingfont}{\makebox[48pt][l]{\thesubsection. }}{0em}{}
\titleformat{name=\subsection,numberless}{\large\headingfont}{\makebox[48pt][l]{\hspace{48pt}}}{0em}{}

\titleformat{name=\subsubsection}[block]{\normalsize\headingfont}{\makebox[48pt][l]{\thesubsubsection. }}{0em}{}
\titleformat{name=\subsubsection,numberless}{\normalsize\headingfont}{\makebox[48pt][l]{\hspace{48pt}}}{0em}{}

\titlespacing*{\chapter}{0em}{-5em}{1.5em}[0cm]
\titlespacing*{\section}{0em}{2em}{1em}[0cm]
\titlespacing*{\subsection}{0em}{2em}{1em}[0cm]
\titlespacing*{\subsubsection}{0em}{1em}{1em}[0cm]

\usepackage{parskip}
\renewcommand{\baselinestretch}{1.5}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt} 
\setlength{\parskip}{1em}

\usepackage{calc}

\usepackage{array}

\usepackage{enumitem}

\setlist[itemize]{itemsep=0cm, leftmargin=8em, labelsep=2em, rightmargin=2em}
\setlist[enumerate]{itemsep=0cm, leftmargin=8em, labelsep=2em, rightmargin=2em}

\newlist{enumtab}{enumerate}{2} 
\setlist[enumtab]{labelindent=0em, labelwidth=2em, leftmargin=3.5em, labelsep=1.5em, label*=\arabic*.}

\newlist{paragraphlist}{enumerate}{1}
\setlist[paragraphlist,1]{itemsep=1em, leftmargin=5em, rightmargin=4em, labelsep=2.5em, label=\arabic*}
%\counterwithin{paragraphlisti}{subsubsection}

% centered table columns with controlable widths
\newcolumntype{P}[1]{>{\centering\arraybackslash}p{#1}}

\setlist{nolistsep}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\usepackage{lastpage}

\usepackage{boldline}

%% Header/Footer
\fancyhead{}
\fancyfoot{}
\setlength{\headheight}{50pt}
\setlength{\footskip}{50pt}

\renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.5}

\counterwithin*{chapter}{part}
\counterwithin*{figure}{part}

%redefine part so that we can place it in the header with \thepart and \parttitle
\newcommand*\parttitle{}
\let\origpart\part
\renewcommand*{\part}[2][]{%
	\ifx\\#1\\% optional argument not present?
	\origpart{#2}%
	\renewcommand*\parttitle{#2}%
	\else
	\origpart[#1]{#2}%
	\renewcommand*\parttitle{#1}%
	\fi
}


% Header
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\fancyhf{}
\fancyhead[L] { \bf{\textcolor{red}{$header$}} \vspace*{2em}}
\fancyhead[R] {Part \thepart : \parttitle \\ \vspace*{0.5em} \leftmark \vspace*{0.5em}}

% Footer
\fancyfoot[C]{ \vspace*{0.5em} Page \thepage \hspace{0.05em} of \pageref{LastPage} \\
}
\fancyfoot[L]{\vspace*{0.5em} EITRI GROUP \\ \vspace*{0.5em} LIMITED}
\fancyfoot[R]{\vspace*{0.5em} $title$ \\}

% Disclaimer PDF
\usepackage{pdfpages}

%% ToC

\usepackage[titles]{tocloft}
\setlength{\cftchapnumwidth}{4em}
\setlength{\cftsecnumwidth}{4em}

\def\contentsname{Contents}

\setlength{\cftbeforetoctitleskip}{0em}
\setlength{\cftaftertoctitleskip}{0em}
\addtocontents{toc}{\protect\thispagestyle{fancy}}

\renewcommand{\cftchapfont}{\large}
\renewcommand{\cftsecfont}{\normalsize}
\renewcommand{\cftsubsecfont}{\small}

%\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
%\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}

\usepackage[edges]{forest}
\usetikzlibrary{fit}
% rotating figures}
\usepackage{rotating, caption}

%new font sizes
\newcommand{\TitleFontSize}{\fontsize{45}{45}\selectfont}

%keep headers/footers off toc/loc pages

\AtBeginDocument{%
\addtocontents{toc}{\protect\thispagestyle{empty}}%
\addtocontents{lof}{\protect\thispagestyle{empty}}%
}

%title page background
\usepackage{eso-pic}
\newcommand\BackgroundPic{%
\put(0,0){%
	\parbox[b][\paperheight]{\paperwidth}{%
		\vfill
		\centering
		\includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight,%
		keepaspectratio]{$titledesign$}%
		\vfill
}}}

\usepackage[absolute,overlay]{textpos}
\usepackage{fix-cm}
\usepackage{amssymb}

\begin{document}

\AddToShipoutPicture*{\BackgroundPic}
	
\begin{titlepage}

	\begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay]
	\node[anchor=north east,inner sep=2em] at (current page.north east)
	{\includegraphics[scale=0.7]{eitri-logo.png}};
\end{tikzpicture}

	\begin{textblock*}{9cm}(6cm,10cm)
		\raggedright
		\textcolor{white}{
			\fontspec{Helvetica Now Display Black}{
				{\flushleft\TitleFontSize PRODUCT 1} \\
				{\flushleft\small PRODUCT FULL NAME 1}}}
	\end{textblock*}
		
		\begin{textblock*}{9cm}(6cm, 13cm)
			\raggedright
			\textcolor{white}{
				\fontspec{Helvetica Now Display Black}{
					{\flushleft\huge $title$} \\}
				\fontspec{Helvetica Now Display Thin}
				{\large $versionnumber$} \\
				{\small Produced \monthname \, \the\year{}}
			}
		\end{textblock*}
		
		% Bottom of the page
		\raggedright
		\begin{textblock*}{19cm}(1cm,28.5cm)
			\footnotesize\textcolor{white}{
				Copyright\textsuperscript{\textcopyright} \the\year{}. This is a sample copyright text. Ownership of all content belong to s-junlee98.\\}
		\end{textblock*}

\end{titlepage}
